name: SLComposeSheetConfigurationItem
desc: An object that provides additional configuration details to use when configuring a composition interface.

items.name: var tapHandler: SLComposeSheetConfigurationItemTapHandler!
items.desc: A custom tap handler block that handles user interaction with a configuration item.

items.name: typealias SLComposeSheetConfigurationItemTapHandler
items.desc: The method signature for a configuration item’s tap handler block.

items.name: var title: String!
items.desc: The name of the configuration item stored as a localized string.

items.name: var value: String!
items.desc: The current value or setting of the configuration item.

items.name: var valuePending: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the configuration item’s value is ready for display.
